name: Of Dreams and Nightmares
description:
Explore the duality of human nature in this adventure game that places you in the shoes of a private hypnotist who traverses the psyche of an odd client who calls on you to help him with a nervous tic. It is clear that this man his harboring many dark secrets, however, as you experience his bizarre fantasies and personal nightmares that he keeps locked away and were never meant to be seen. While your journey starts as a simple task, it quickly turns into a game of life and death as you encounter malicious oddities that would see you locked in your client's psyche perpetually if you aren't careful.

NOTE: The audio is a little wonky. We will be making it better soon, just ran out of time during the jam!
